title: Blox Fruits Script BT Project (Mobile) - Auto Farm, Auto Quest
text:
For fans of the most popular roblox game Blox Fruits great news, we publish a working script for the mobile version of this game. The script from BT Project was developed specifically for the latest version of this game, it has a GUI with the most useful functions, including Auto Farm, Auto Quest, Fast Attack, Speed Hack, Jump Hack, No Clip, Anti AFK, Infinite Jump, Teleports and others. Blox Fruits is a popular roblox adventure game, it is known for its dynamic gameplay and active community. This game features different islands, battles with enemies and very strong bosses, players also unlock devil fruits that give special and very powerful abilities. The mobile script for Blox Fruits is available to you for free from Cheater.fun.
How to use Roblox Scripts?
creator: BT Project
link: local Old Old = hookfunction(request, newcclosure(function(a, b)     if type(a) == "table" then         for i, v in pairs(a) do             if i == "Url" and v == 'https://btteam.net/checkpoint/check.php' then                 return {                     StatusCode = 200,                     Body = 'lol'                 }             elseif i == "Url" and v == 'https://btteam.net/checkpoint/verify.php?h=lol&k=Cracked' then                 return {                     StatusCode = 200,                     Body = '{"status":"success","message":"VALID_KEY"}'                 }             end         end     end     return Old(a, b) end)) loadstring(game:HttpGet('https://btteam.net/scripts-auth/', true))()
